embedding.apiKey.label: Embedding API Key
embedding.apiKey.help: API key for embeddings (OpenAI or Doubao). You can also use ${OPENAI_API_KEY} or ${VOLCENGINE_API_KEY}.

embedding.model.label: Embedding Model
embedding.model.help: Embedding model to use (e.g. text-embedding-3-small, doubao-embedding-vision-251215)

embedding.provider.label: Embedding Provider
embedding.provider.help: Embedding provider: 'openai' (default), 'doubao', or 'local' for local models.

embedding.localModelPath.label: Local Model Path
embedding.localModelPath.help: Path to local embedding model file (GGUF format) for 'local' provider

embedding.localModelCacheDir.label: Local Model Cache Dir
embedding.localModelCacheDir.help: Directory for caching local model files (defaults to ~/.node-llama-cpp/models)

embedding.dimensions.label: Embedding Dimensions
embedding.dimensions.help: Vector dimensions for the embedding model. If not specified, will be inferred from the model name.

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically capture important information from conversations

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Automatically inject relevant memories into context

storageOptions.label: Storage Options
storageOptions.help: Storage configuration options (access_key, secret_key, endpoint, etc.)
